00001 #ifndef DUNE_INTEGRATE_ENTITY_HH
00002 #define DUNE_INTEGRATE_ENTITY_HH
00003 
00010 template<class Iterator, class Functor>
00011 double integrateentity (const Iterator& it, const Functor& f, int p,
00012                         const Dune::FieldVector<double,2>& r,
00013                         const Dune::FieldVector<double,2>& normal)
00014 {
00015   // dimension of the entity 
00016   const int dim = Iterator::Intersection::mydimension;
00017 
00018   // type used for coordinates in the grid
00019   typedef typename Iterator::Intersection::ctype ct;
00020 
00021   // get geometry type
00022   Dune::GeometryType gt = it->type();
00023 
00024   // get quadrature rule of order p
00025   const Dune::QuadratureRule<ct,dim>& 
00026       rule = Dune::QuadratureRules<ct,dim>::rule(gt,p); /*@\label{ieh:qr}@*/
00027 
00028   // ensure that rule has at least the requested order
00029   if (rule.order()<p)
00030         DUNE_THROW(Dune::Exception,"order not available");
00031 
00032   // compute approximate integral
00033   double result=0;
00034   for (typename Dune::QuadratureRule<ct,dim>::const_iterator i=rule.begin(); /*@\label{ieh:for}@*/
00035            i!=rule.end(); ++i)
00036         {
00037           Dune::FieldVector<ct,dim+1> r_prime = it->geometry().global(i->position());
00038           //std::cout << "r: " << r << "\tr_prime: " << r_prime << "\tr-r_prime " << (r-r_prime) << std::endl;
00039           double fval = f((r-r_prime),normal); /*@\label{ieh:fval}@*/
00040           double weight = i->weight();                  /*@\label{ieh:weight}@*/
00041           double detjac = it->geometry().integrationElement(i->position()); /*@\label{ieh:detjac}@*/
00042           result += fval * weight * detjac;             /*@\label{ieh:result}@*/
00043         }
00044 
00045   // return result
00046   return result;
00047 }
00048 #endif
